response.overview: Relive the excitement, imagination and essence of the Walt Disney World Millennium Celebration with this video, designed to capture the events centered around Epcot that make this celebration one to treasure for a lifetime! The nighttime photography will dazzle you again and again, with spectacular footage of "Illuminations 2000: Reflections of Earth," featuring music, fireworks, lasers, fire and water. Also included is "Tapestry of Nations," a vibrant parare uniting stunning artistry, inspirational music and millennium-inspired themes. Cherish the memory of this unforgettable celebration of the creativity, imagination and inspiration of the human spirit, found exclusively at the Walt Disney World Resort.
response.tagline: The Celebration of a Lifetime at the Walt Disney World Resort
response.title: Marking the Millennium
